title: Endow
description:
Description :
        “If I continue to play the violin, teacher will not leave me, right?” Even in a world where the top occupations are mostly occupied by alphas, Du Chengxuan, who is a beta, is evaluated by the world as a rare violin prodigy in ten years. But Chengxuan didn’t seem to care at all about these achievements. The only thing he cares about was the Ω tutor who is 13 years older than him…
